contributeToPatient(uint256).details: Automatically disburses ETH to patient once target met.

contributeToPatient(uint256).notice: Contribute ETH to an endorsed appeal.

endorseHealthAppeal(uint256).notice: Endorse an appeal and issue a token.

getContributorAmount(uint256,address).notice: Get contribution amount by a contributor.

getContributors(uint256).notice: List all contributors for an appeal.

isTargetAchieved(uint256).notice: Check if an appeal's target is achieved.

payContributionsToPatient(uint256).notice: Disburse raised funds to the patient (manual override).

rejectHealthAppeal(uint256).notice: Reject an appeal, blocking further contributions.
